content: remix coaster copyright 2007 melissa green materials needed size h 4 0 mm hook small amount of ww 100% cotton yarn special stitches v­ st double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in same space or st indicated round 1­ chain 4 7 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook join in beg chain 4 8 double_crochet round 2­ chain 3 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around 16 dcs round 3­chain 4 double_crochet in same st beg v­st made v­st in each double_crochet around join in 3rd chain of beg chain 4 16 v­sts round 4­slip_stitch into 1st chain­1 space chain 3 4 double_crochet in same space single_crochet in next chain­1 space 5 double_crochet in next chain­1 space single_crochet in next chain­1 space repeat around join in 3rd chain of beg chain 3 finish off 40 double_crochet 8 single_crochet copyright 2007 melissa green please do not copy or share this pattern you are welcome to sell items you make using this design
